articles.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
articles.title: The Latest: Trump and Harris are set to debate in Philadelphia - The Associated Press
articles.description: Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are gearing up to take the stage for Tuesday night’s debate in Philadelphia, where they’ll fight to sway 2024 election voters on the biggest stage in U.S. politics. The event, at 9 p.m. Eastern, will offer Americans their most d…
articles.content:
Kamala Harris and Donald Trump are gearing up to take the stage for Tuesday nights debate in Philadelphia, where theyll fight to sway 2024 election voters on the biggest stage in U.S. politics.
